# SEQ22 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 22 focuses on the most important areas and rooms (in offices, workshops and public buildings)

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl152, apl153, apl154, apl155, apl156, apl157, apl158, apl159, apl160, apl161

## Emergent Phenomena
Work buildings with spaces that support both individual work and group collaboration

## Overview
This sequence contains 10 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
